import React, {useState, Component } from "react"; import patientIcon from './images/patientIcon.png'; import Perscription from './startPerscription'; import {Modal, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import cert from './images/cert.png' import Review from './reviewAndConfirm' import nameIcon from './images/nameIcon.png' import email from './images/email.png' import phoneIcon from './images/phoneIcon.png' import gender from './images/gender.png' import $ from 'jquery'; function Med (props) { function closeAll() { $('#options, #perscription').modal('hide'); } const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const medications = ["DICLOFENAC", "DMSO", "TETRACAINE", "GABAPENTIN", "LIDOCAINE", "BACLOFEN"] const renderEdits = medications.map((x) => { if (props.formula.toLowerCase().includes(x.toLowerCase())) return (
); }); return (

Click one of the boxes below to select the formula

Perscription:

Instructions for Use:

Name

); }; export default Med;
